title: Case, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads, glass beads
Technique: appliquéd and embroidered in split and knot stitches on satin weave
dimensions: H x W (including tassels): 35 x 9 cm (13 3/4 x 3 1/2 in.)
description: Case of yellow satin, appliquéd and embroidered with a vase and plant in colored silks. Bound in braid and fitted with yellow cord, knots, and tassels.

tombstone.epitaph:
Case, 19th century.Medium: silk, metallic threads, glass beads
Technique: appliquéd and embroidered in split and knot stitches on satin weave. 1939-37-6.
